sense.def: Illness Sign of a discharge of yellow liquid from local lesions resulting from pathological changes, or from locations where a topical medical treatment was applied. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 5: 治小兒傷寒發黃…搗韭根汁澄清，取如大豆許，滴兒鼻中，即出黃水， 瘥 , “To cure children harmed by cold who turn yellow, … pound the roots of jiu and let the juice settle until the liquid is clear. Take an amount of the size of a soy bean and drop into the child’s nose. This will cause a discharge of yellow water , and brings the cure”.
